definition: Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge

sentences.english: Crack the eggs and separate yolks from whites, very carefully.
sentences.chinese: 敲開蛋殼，然後小心地把蛋黃從蛋清中分離出來。

sentences.english: Lysozyme is withdrawed from the egg white in the industry.
sentences.chinese: 現在工業上生產溶菌酶主要是從蛋清中提取。

sentences.english: Fold in the beaten whites of two eggs.
sentences.chinese: 加進兩個打散的蛋清後攪勻。

sentences.english: I'm going to breakfast an egg-white omelet with vegetable and cheddar filling.
sentences.chinese: 我早飯要喫裏面帶蔬菜和乾酪餡的煎蛋清卷。

sentences.english: Next comes beating the egg whites.
Egg whites are healthier than whole eggs.
Add a pinch of salt and whisk until the whites hold a stiff peak.
sentences.chinese: 加入少量鹽攪拌，直到蛋清成形。

sentences.english: Separate whites from yolks, and heat the oven up to 180 degrees.
sentences.chinese: 把蛋黃與蛋清分開，並且把烤箱加熱到180度。

sentences.english: Spread the potatoes evenly in the pan and pour the egg mixture evenly on top. Do not stir.
sentences.chinese: 將土豆餅平鋪在鍋裏，倒入蛋清混合物，不要攪拌。

sentences.english: In a clean bowl, beat the egg whites to peaks.
sentences.chinese: 在一個乾淨的碗裏，把蛋清打到最稠，使它上勁。

sentences.english: Oily skin takes the egg white, to which a bit of lemon or honey can be added.
sentences.chinese: 油質皮膚就用蛋清，也可以加入一點檸檬或蜂蜜。

sentences.english: Today the wines are fined with egg whites but not filtered before bottling.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄酒裝瓶前，會使用蛋清澄清，但是不經過過濾。

sentences.english: Beat egg whites until stiff and fold into cake mixture.
sentences.chinese: 將蛋清攪打至硬性發泡，混入蛋糕料中。

sentences.english: Place the egg whites in the bowl of an electric mixer fitted with a whisk attachment.
sentences.chinese: 將蛋清放入帶有攪蛋器的電動攪拌機。

sentences.english: Ropiness looks like partially cooked egg white.
sentences.chinese: 粘絲狀的醃汁看起來有點像半熟的蛋清。

definition: abbr. for 低筋麵粉|低筋面粉[di1 jin1 mian4 fen3]
